pattern.regexp: ^((Error|Fatal):[^:]+:.* at ([^;]+);( from)?( line ([0-9]+))?( col ([0-9]+))?( to line [0-9]+( col [0-9]+)?)?|(Error|Fatal):[^:]+:.*|(Conversion|Postprocessing) failed.*)$
^((Info|Warning):[^:]+:.* at ([^;]+);( from)?( line ([0-9]+))?( col ([0-9]+))?( to line [0-9]+( col [0-9]+)?)?|(Info|Warning):[^:]+:.*|(Conversion|Postprocessing) complete.* \(See.*)$
